channel.title: Equine on Synanthropic Arts
channel.description: Recent content in Equine on Synanthropic Arts

item.title: Donkey
item.description: Donkey Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes Socketed teeth Removable / interchangable eye-lids Size adjustable liner Fully cast-in-place lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used to make him.
